page.title: 02Transport in Scaleby
page.content: Ribble Bus Services operate in this area but the number of journeys is few and they are little used as most people rely on private cars for transport. {Scaleby}has five buses on each weekday to and from {Carlisle}in school holidays and four buses in term time. These go on to {Smithfield} and{ {Hethersgill}and two per week go to Noblestown. {Laversdale}has four buses a day from { {Carlisle;}These go on to Brampton or{ {Irthington. On Saturdays there are two buses to {Scaleby} and three to {Laversdale. There is no Sunday service.
